intro: Rungia eriostachya, commonly known as the narrow-stemmed rungia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, branching stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale yellow, arranged in clusters, and it produces small, round berries. Rungia eriostachya is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and modest flowering display.
